title: misc/cgo/testcarchive: TestSigaltstack flake on darwin-386
body:
Recent flaky test:

https://build.golang.org/log/bedf20ab4fc42f711d6379688739cbc2575642fd
```
##### misc/cgo/testcarchive
--- FAIL: TestSigaltstack (1.08s)
	carchive_test.go:438: pthread_kill: No such process
	carchive_test.go:439: exit status 1
FAIL
2016/05/06 08:41:15 Failed: exit status 1
```
